entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Kirkland Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:50 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:50 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
